name: rspec2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c1, w0))
-| wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
-| wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0))

comment: Specialization rule for restricted quantification, with two quantifiers. (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-1994.)
